description.lang: This device is an accessory of the Z-Wave system and enable detection of opened or closed access locations in your home. Features:* Detects when your door/window is opened or closed* Magnetic separation trigger function* Hidden tamper prevention Trigger* Low battery detection* External Switch* 100ft line of sight* LED Status Indicator* Operating temp: -15oC~60oC* Working Voltage: 3V* Dimensions: 87*25*21mm
